summary: A repository for resources focused on personal and organizational growth, strategic planning, and self-awareness. Currently, it showcases a course titled "Align the Misaligned" which emphasizes discovering personal strengths and weaknesses, strategic networking, and conducting SWOT analyses for startups.
excerpt: Aligning the Misaligned involves a journey of growth and strategic planning. Discovering personal strengths builds confidence and direction. Embracing weaknesses fosters resilience and self-awareness.
